column2: title=The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Legions of Middle-earth

date=[[29 July]] [[2006]]<ref name=amazon>[http://www.amazon.com/Legions-Middle-Earth-Matthew-Ward/dp/1841547719/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1316338602&sr=1-1 Legions of Middle-Earth] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 18 September 2011)</ref>

column1: '''''The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Legions of Middle-earth''''' is a supplement for [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.

The Legions of Middle-earth expansion book is the definitive guide to playing head-to-head games of The Lord of The Rings Strategy Battle Game. With over 40 army lists to choose from, each with its own flavour and unique options, you can create a themed and balanced force from your collection. In addition, rules for allies allow you to use much of your collection, while still respecting the books and films, allowing greater tactical flexibility and the chance to add some favoured models to your army.

*[http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/70913/lord-rings-strategy-battle-game-legions-middle-ear Lord of the Rings - Strategy Battle Game: Legions of Middle-Earth] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
